original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Bergensbanen
overview: The journey on the famous Bergensbanen begins in Oslo which contains a large variety of historic buildings that are well worth a visit. The city originated in the eleventh century during the reign of King Harald Hårdråde. The journey on the Bergensbanen travels through one of the most charming & natural landscapes in Europe & it also features the history of Norway: a unique adventure indeed!
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Bergensbanen
